name: w08d03-hw
description: * Install mongoose  * Create app.js file and make the connection with mongoose * Create models folder that contain schema for author and book     * author schema:         1. name ==> type: string, required with message: "Author name should be provided"         2. age ==> type: Number         3. nationality ==> type: String, required with message: "Author nationality should be provided"         4. image ==> type: string, required with message: "Author image should be provided"         5. gender  ==> type: string         6. books ==> array of bookSchema
